Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
Answer Answer Class - coloured words that represents the possible answers extends Node so that it can be converted to Node and added to Pane (displayed via JavaFx)
GameApp GameApp Class - launches the game via menu and sets the different scenes extends Application so that it runs JavaFx
GameApp.MenuBox MenuBox Class - dedicated to creating layout of buttons extends VBox, responsible for setting layout of items vertically
GameApp.MenuItem MenuItem Class - Creates the graphics of each button and sets its mouse events
GameOver GameOver Class - creates the background where the game over sign and exit route will be displayed extends StackPane so that it can create a single object made of different components (Rectangle and Text) and allow it to be added to root
HighScoreManager HighScoreManager is the class responsible for creating, loading and updating the scores file
InstructionsScene InstructionsScene Class - reponsible for creating the graphic interface of the instructions scene
LeaderBoardScene LeaderBoardScene Class - responsible for creating the graphic interface of the leaderboard scene and calling the method that displays scores from a file
Life Life Class - graphic representation of the lives the user has.
MenuScene MenuScene Class - responsible for creating graphic interface of menu
Player Player Class - represents the avatar the user moves around the game window.
Question Question Class - represents the word the user will need to collide with extends Node so that it can be converted to Node and added to Pane (displayed via JavaFx)
Score Score Class - responsible for storing the username and its score implements Serializable
ScoreBoard ScoreBoard Class - creates the text "SCORE" and the score (value) itself extends StackPane so that it can create a single object made of more than one component (2 Texts) and allow it to be added to root
ScoreComparator ScoreComparator Class - used for comparing scores and returning the outcome of this comparison
Sounds Sounds Class - responsible for initiating the sounds and creating MediaPlayer objects that will be played on GameApp class
